Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to telepsychiatry
Summary: Relates to telepsychiatry and requires a study, report and recommendations regarding geriatric social isolation.
LawCode: Amd ยง7.41, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to telepsychiatry
